summary: This is an email from a prosecutor's office requesting travel arrangements for a fact witness needed for grand jury preparation in the Epstein case on February 7, 2020. The witness is to travel from Florida on February 6th.

persons.name: A Nimiw
persons.context: Appears to be the sender of the email requesting travel arrangements for a fact witness for grand jury preparation in the Epstein case.

events.title: Grand Jury Preparation
events.description: A fact witness is needed for grand jury preparation in the Epstein case.

events.title: Witness Travel to New York
events.description: A fact witness is scheduled to fly from Florida to New York for grand jury preparation.

keyFacts: A fact witness was required for grand jury preparation in the Epstein case in early February 2020.
The witness needed to travel from Florida to New York, indicating the investigation involved individuals or evidence located in multiple states.
The email demonstrates ongoing prosecutorial activity in the Epstein case in January 2020, following Epstein's death in August 2019.
